div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annnotation: '[…]22. 668. Abschrift versandt d 22/6. 82. Tr' [Copy sent 22 June 1882 Tr].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Baronet Ferdinand von Müller D. phil. med Mr.F.D.H. Director des zoolog u botanischen Gartens

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendungen vom 5 u 20 v. Mtn "Eucalypts of Australia" und Address on the Development of Rural Industries, danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Baron Ferdinand von Mueller D. phil. med. Mr.F.D.H
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstift [Master of the Free German Academy].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Director of the zoological and botanical garden

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of 5 and 20 of the previous month "Eucalypts of Australia"
Possibly B82.13.17. and Address on the Development of Rural Industries
B80.13.09. The address was delivered to the Rural Section of the Melbourne Social Science Congress. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Tr.
Trappe; see Freies Deutsches Hochstift to M, 4 April 1882.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
